eprosima::rpc::transport::Transport

eprosima::rpc::transport::Transport Class Reference
[Transports]

This class is the base of all classes that implement a transport that could be used by the proxy or the server. More...

Detailed Description

This class is the base of all classes that implement a transport that could be used by the proxy or the server.
